title: How To Make A ROBLOX GAME In Under 30 SECS!
transcript: here's how to make any Roblox game in three lines of code first make a script in workspace and copy exactly what I do word for word while you true do instance. new part comma workspace end what instance. new does is generate a random game from the Roblox homepage if you copied exactly what I did word for word go ahead and press play and boom I got murderer mystery 2 and you'll probably get a random game if this helped you out join my Discord linked to my bio
